pages.text: $(special)Ender Pocket$() (Teleport Drops) automatically $(important)teleports block drops directly into your inventory$()!$(br2)No more chasing items or losing them to lava!

pages.title: How It Works
pages.text: When you break a block:$(br2)1. Block drops are generated$(br)2. Drops $(important)instantly teleport$() to your inventory$(br)3. No item entities spawn$(br)4. No items to lose!$(br2)Works with $(tool)Fortune$(), $(tool)Silk Touch$(), and all other drop-modifying effects!

pages.title: Perfect For
pages.text: $(li)Mining over lava$(li)Strip mining$(li)Underwater mining$(li)Preventing despawning$(li)High-speed clearing$(li)Void mining in The End$(br2)$(o)Your personal Ender Chest!$()
